thing-type.description: Duewi ZW BJ ES 1000 / Reitz 05431 / ZWave.me 05457 Single button wall switch<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtFor wireless switching of: light bulbs, HV and LV halogen lamps or electrical equipment (e.g. fans). Combinable with all Z-Wave transmitters and remote controls, with installation in splash-proof junction box IP 44, can be selectively installed in flush-mounted power points and canopies or triggered directly via wireless rockers.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtPress 3x within 1.5 seconds the "UP" or "DOWN" button for the group on the remote control in which the device is to be included.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtIn the case of a flush mounted module press 3x within 1.5 seconds either the "UP" 1 or the "DOWN" 2 button.</p&gt
